OkeySport – компания, специализирующаяся: OkeySport is a company specializing in the organization and holding of corporate sports events. Our offices are located in Khabarovsk, Komsomolsk-on-Amur, Vladivostok and other Russian cities.
Компания «OkeySport» работает на рынке e: OkeySport Company has been operating in the event services market since 2010. During this time, we have conducted more than 500 projects, in which more than 300,000 people took part. We have held many events in such cities as Moscow, St. Petersburg, Sochi, Rostov-on-Don, Krasnodar, Volgograd, Smolensk, Orel, Belgorod, Kaliningrad, Nizhny Novgorod, Samara, Yekaterinburg, Novosibirsk, Tomsk, Kostroma, Ufa, Nizhnevartovsk, Antalya (Turkey). We have an extensive database of sports stars who are frequent guests of our events.
Внедрение в корпоративную культуру униве: Introduction of a universal step-by-step set of actions to create sports within companies into corporate culture
Обеспечение полного цикла спортивных мер: Providing a full cycle of sports events throughout the year for companies of all industries
Создание отраслевых спортивных движений: Creation of industry-specific sports movements under the auspices of federal authorities
Сопутствующее техническое обеспечение сп: Related technical support of sports teams with equipment, training grounds, inventory
Создание командного духа и дружеской атм: Creating a team spirit and a friendly atmosphere in the team
Штат постоянных сотрудников составляет б: The staff of permanent employees is more than 50 people. Own PR department. Ample opportunities to attract partners and sponsors to projects. Full-time designers.
Залогом успеха при организации мероприят: The key to success in organizing events is clear planning, attention to detail and a structured approach. We fully possess the necessary technologies and knowledge.
Мы имеем огромной опыт организации мероп: We have extensive experience in organizing events in the Sport event format. Our company holds its own events every day, as well as projects commissioned by customers.
Мы понимаем, что у каждого клиента есть: We understand that each client has a special culture, values and traditions. When working on an event, the project manager dives very deeply into the atmosphere of the company and tries to become a part of it.
Мы доказали свою состоятельность, получи: We have proved our worth by getting many serious companies to our credit, to which we regularly provide services for organizing events at the highest level.
Мы способны формировать новые идеи и пре: We are able to form new ideas and proposals, as well as successfully disseminate and promote them. We are not afraid of the new and unknown.
